ProjectTitle: The domain-specific and domain-general cognitive and neural processes underlying human success and failure
InitialFeedbackHistory: 01/07/2024 Please note that you used an older DMP template, for your future BOF/IOF and FWO DMPs, please use the [REDACTED] standard DMP template which you can find in DMPonline.be or as word template on the FWO website: https://www.fwo.be/en/about-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan-dmp/ [REDACTED] preserving data on external hard drives is not very secure, please have a look at the storage guide: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en or contact your local IT department to discuss more secure and economic solutions
